name: Income Tax Cocktail
description: The Income Tax is nothing more than a Bronx with bitters. But that's okay; the bitters add such a depth of flavor that the cocktail earns a new moniker.
recipeIngredient: 3/4 ounce freshly squeezed orange juice from 1 orange

recipeInstructions.text: Add gin, dry vermouth, sweet vermouth, orange juice, and bitters to an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake until well chilled. Strain into a cocktail glass. Garnish with an orange wheel and serve.
